page.title: 19VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Neasham Covert. The Darlington Brown Trout Angling Association enjoy coarse fishing rights in a deep pond all year. This Association is strictly for members, no visitors or day permits allowed.
Neasham. A whist drive is held at the Village Hall every Friday evening at 7 o'clock. All are welcome. A Domino drive is held at the Village hall every Tuesday evening at 7.15 pm. All are welcome.
River Tees Fishing rights owned by the Teesside Angling Association with the exception of two privately owned stretches, and free fishing from Neasham Village Green.
